name: Day Of Dead
description:
'Day Of Dead' is a casual game with the theme of terror. The game simulates a pinball machine. The player controls the left and right baffles to hit the marbles out, so as not to let the marbles fall into the middle hole.
[Game control]
Left: S
Right: L
Emission: spaces
[Game features]
This is a pinball machine simulation game. The playing method is the same as that of traditional pinball machines. It doesn't let the pinball fall into the middle hole. Once the marbles fall into the middle hole, the game fails.
The marbles will have different rebound effects when they touch different objects in the game, and will also increase different points.
The game is easy to operate and suitable for playing in leisure time.
